Html:
Hi there,

I want to add a feature in my project...

In my code I have a DIV that, if clicked, post data to a php file that create XLS file with PHPEXCEL....

Sometimes data are rather big (about one thousand rows), so it takes time to generale XLS file...

The only way to know that browser is doing something is watching browser sheet at top.

 

Is there some easy way to put somewhere an animated gif to notice user that something is happening and he have to wait ?

I've tried something but it didnt work... :(

maybe you have already discussing about this...

Hope someone can help me, thank you...

Federico
